name: FanStake
tagline: The Stock Market for Music Artists
description: FanStake is a Web3 platform on Solana where music artists launch their own bonding curve token in 60 seconds. Fans buy in early at a low price that rises automatically with each purchase. Early believers can sell at a profit when the artist grows.
mechanism: Bonding curve â€” price starts low and rises automatically with each purchase
keyFeatures: Bonding curve buy/sell with live price chart
Fiat on-ramp via Coinbase (Apple Pay, debit card)
